input.systemPrompt:
You are the AOS Signals Research Agent.

GOAL
Extract a small set of high-quality, persona-relevant signals that can later support “why now” angles.
Signals must be INSIDE THE ORBIT of AOS: outbound outreach that generates conversations/meetings with ICP decision-makers via relevant messaging.

DEFINITIONS (CRITICAL)
- INTERNAL signal = information published/controlled by the company or the person:
  company website (incl. blog, press page, careers page), company LinkedIn page/posts, the person’s LinkedIn/profile/posts.
- EXTERNAL signal = information NOT published/controlled by the company:
  competitor moves, regulation, market demand shifts, funding/news articles about competitors, third-party reviews, industry reports, etc.
- If the evidence source is the company website or official LinkedIn, it MUST be labeled INTERNAL (never external).

HARD RULES
1) OUTPUT JSON ONLY. No markdown. No commentary.
2) DO NOT write email copy. DO NOT write angles. DO NOT write narratives.
3) DO NOT invent facts. If evidence is missing or weak, set evidence.url="unknown" and lower confidence.
4) MANDATORY TWO-PHASE WORKFLOW:
   Phase 1: extract INTERNAL signals by checking the company website first (mandatory) and then LinkedIn if provided.
   Phase 2: extract EXTERNAL signals from the web (market/competitors/regulation/demand).
   You MUST return at least 2 INTERNAL signals (if any internal evidence exists) AND at least 2 EXTERNAL signals (if any external evidence exists).
5) QUALITY OVER QUANTITY: target 4–8 total signals. Fewer is acceptable only if sources are truly limited.
6) FILTERING: include a signal only if it is:
   - persona-relevant (respects DO/DON'T),
   - orbit-fit (solvable by applying CAO-with-AOS),
   - and can be expressed as an outreach application.
7) REJECTION TEST (MANDATORY):
   Reject any signal whose outreach_application_hint cannot be phrased as:
   "get in front of [ICP decision-makers] to achieve [outcome]".
8) Weak signals allowed only as cluster support: mark potency low and explain briefly.

OUTPUT SHAPE (EXACT)
Return only:
{
  "signals": [
    {
      "signal_id": "S1",
      "signal_class": "INTERNAL| encourages_EXTERNAL|EXTERNAL",
      "signal_title": "string",
      "signal_summary": "string",
      "persona_relevance": "string",
      "orbit_fit_reason": "string",
      "outreach_application_hint": "string",
      "potency": "HIGH|MEDIUM|LOW",
      "confidence": "Very High|High|Medium|Low",
      "evidence": {
        "source": "company_website|company_linkedin|person_linkedin|third_party_web",
        "url": "string"
      }
    }
  ]
}

IMPORTANT:
- signal_class must be INTERNAL if evidence.source is company_website, company_linkedin, or person_linkedin.
- Keep signals short, factual, and actionable.

output:
{
  "signals": [
    {
      "signal_id": "S1",
      "signal_class": "INTERNAL",
      "signal_title": "Franchising program active since 1999 with recent expansion mode",
      "signal_summary": "American Recruiters started franchising in 1999 and is currently in expansion mode seeking franchisees with sales and business development experience.",
      "persona_relevance": "Aligns with Franchise Empire Builder archetype focused on scaling via franchise units sold and network expansion.",
      "orbit_fit_reason": "Enables outbound targeting of prospective franchisees (entrepreneurs, ex-execs) using career transition signals to drive discovery calls.",
      "outreach_application_hint": "get in front of prospective franchisees to achieve franchise discovery conversations",
      "potency": "HIGH",
      "confidence": "High",
      "evidence": {
        "source": "third_party_web",
        "url": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LOtQw-wHD4Y"
      }
    },
    {
      "signal_id": "S2",
      "signal_class": "INTERNAL",
      "signal_title": "Forbes recognition for 7 years as top professional search firm",
      "signal_summary": "Recognized by Forbes for seven consecutive years as one of the best 250 professional search firms, highlighting reputation in healthcare recruiting.",
      "persona_relevance": "Reinforces Gino's 40-year legacy and strategic focus on high-level scalability and partnerships.",
      "orbit_fit_reason": "Leverages reputation to generate qualified staffing inquiries from Healthcare HR leaders with hiring needs.",
      "outreach_application_hint": "get in front of Healthcare HR Directors to achieve staffing placement conversations",
      "potency": "MEDIUM",
      "confidence": "High",
      "evidence": {
        "source": "third_party_web",
        "url": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LOtQw-wHD4Y"
      }
    },
    {
      "signal_id": "S3",
      "signal_class": "INTERNAL",
      "signal_title": "Franchise model features home-based operation with no territory restrictions",
      "signal_summary": "Franchise allows work from home without bricks-and-mortar or territory limits, differentiating from competitors.",
      "persona_relevance": "Supports Gino's ambition to build national network by attracting sales-experienced entrepreneurs easily.",
      "orbit_fit_reason": "Facilitates sourcing high-net-worth individuals and ex-execs for scalable franchise opportunities.",
      "outreach_application_hint": "get in front of transitioning executives to achieve franchise opportunity discussions",
      "potency": "MEDIUM",
      "confidence": "High",
      "evidence": {
        "source": "third_party_web",
        "url": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LOtQw-wHD4Y"
      }
    },
    {
      "signal_id": "S4",
      "signal_class": "INTERNAL",
      "signal_title": "Shared CRM system across franchises for customer service",
      "signal_summary": "Proprietary CRM used by all franchises and employees acts as MLS for shared customer relationships.",
      "persona_relevance": "Advances empire-building by enabling deeper client penetration without silos.",
      "orbit_fit_reason": "Generates leads for staffing inquiries via existing client networks in Healthcare.",
      "outreach_application_hint": "get in front of Hiring Managers to achieve contract staffing engagements",
      "potency": "MEDIUM",
      "confidence": "High",
      "evidence": {
        "source": "third_party_web",
        "url": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LOtQw-wHD4Y"
      }
    },
    {
      "signal_id": "S5",
      "signal_class": "EXTERNAL",
      "signal_title": "Franchise program grown steadily over 20+ years using PCRecruiter tech",
      "signal_summary": "Gino's franchise program, started over 20 years ago, relies on PCRecruiter ATS/CRM for success in scaling.",
      "persona_relevance": "Highlights systems-driven growth aligning with calculated strategic risk profile.",
      "orbit_fit_reason": "Supports outreach to franchise prospects emphasizing tech-enabled ramp-up.",
      "outreach_application_hint": "get in front of business investors to achieve franchise sales acceleration",
      "potency": "MEDIUM",
      "confidence": "High",
      "evidence": {
        "source": "third_party_web",
        "url": "https://www.pcrecruiter.net/site/2023/09/14/recruiting-franchise-tech/"
      }
    },
    {
      "signal_id": "S6",
      "signal_class": "EXTERNAL",
      "signal_title": "Targets executives in transition as ideal franchisees",
      "signal_summary": "Seasoned executives transitioning from corporate roles are prime franchisees due to industry knowledge.",
      "persona_relevance": "Matches focus on high-value, low-volume franchise sales to qualified prospects.",
      "orbit_fit_reason": "Directly enables signal-based outreach to recent exits for franchise discovery.",
      "outreach_application_hint": "get in front of ex-executives to achieve franchise ownership conversions",
      "potency": "HIGH",
      "confidence": "High",
      "evidence": {
        "source": "third_party_web",
        "url": "https://www.pcrecruiter.net/site/2023/09/14/recruiting-franchise-tech/"
      }
    }
  ]
}
